function.name: accessibility_turnOff
function.description: This function is used to turn off the accessibility feature of SmartThings devices using speech.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to turn off the accessibility feature.

predefinedAccessibilityMenu.description: The predefined accessibility menu option to turn off.
